Title: Urban Planning of Underground Space: The development of Approaches to the Formation of Underground Complexes - Metro Stations as Independent Real Estate Objects
Abstract: The paper considers the stages of formation of the complex of works on technical inventory and cadastral registration of underground complexes - metro stations. The article describes a universal approach to the formation of these complex unique structures as real estate. The paper describes methods of forming and determining the boundaries of underground complexes, metro stations, which were tested separately for different structures and their combination. The calculation results allowed identifying different categories of non-residential premises located in the underground levels of the metro stations. © 2016 The Authors.

Title: Solution of problems on the base of building information models

Title: Specifics of creating digital twins of underground complexes (metro stations)
Source title: Proceedings of the BIM in Construction & Architecture Proceedings of III International Conference BIMAC 2020

Title: Analytical review of international experience in the formation of 3D models in the inventory
Mapping of linear engineering facilities using the results of laser scanning
Abstract: The article describes the procedure and specific features of mapping on the basis of data acquired through mobile, ground and aerial laser scanning. Possibilities of integrating the materials of scanning with other cartographic and informational data are illustrated by the example of a project aimed at the acquisition and processing of data for the sections of four railways (Oktyabrsky, Ryazansky, Smolensky and Bryansky) with the total length of 1400 km.

Authors: Karaneyeva A., Starostina O., Panasenko E.
